Workflow software.Definition:
A resource that provides an application or program which automates, at least to some degree, a process or processes that requires a series of steps. Workflow are created to quicken processes, help manage relationships, and define the series of requirements. Workflow software works in the background allowing the user to do something simultaneously.
NITRC definition: A software application that manages 'workflow'; the sequence of operations upon a data stream. Can include visual monitoring progress and/or construction of workflow specifications.
